programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's beau gives up a lucrative legal practice to become a circus clown.

programme.desc: Rose feels insecure about her romance with a college professor.

programme.desc: Blanche turns the tables and proposes to her brother-in-law.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles turns to Daphne for dance lessons to prepare himself for a country club function.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier is panic-stricken by a surprise visit from Diane (Shelley Long), the woman who left him at the altar.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: The football players think they're doomed when Cheyenne serves the wrong kind of potato salad at the traditional pregame dinner.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's ex-husband becomes jealous when she calls a plumber to fix a faucet; Cheyenne "moons" Van's teammates.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's best friend returns to Houston and uncovers a photograph that hints at infidelity early in Reba and Brock's marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba celebrates her divorce with lunch and finds her credit card is declined; Reba is angered to find out Brock let Barbra Jean run up the shared credit card for her wedding.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's parents visit and surprise everyone when they accept Barbra Jean into the family.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba returns to work but is fired when advice to a teen couple is misinterpreted as endorsing premarital sex.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Sealed With a List
programme.desc: This holiday season, festive Carley sets out to conquer her list of abandoned resolutions from last year. Aided by co-worker Wyatt, she finds love and the confidence to chase her dreams.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: Everything Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her roommate embark on a road trip to Yuletide Springs, a town where Christmas is celebrated year-round.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: A Machu Picchu Proposal
programme.desc: Katie helps plan her brother's proposal atop Machu Picchu. When the proposal is ruined by spontaneous Chef Carlos, Katie enlists Carlos to help her find the most romantic spot in all of Peru.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy decides to do something with her life by signing up for a comedy spot at the Comedy Barrel, but Sophia is unimpressed; Blanche is having tax problems, but decides it's nothing that a negligee won't put right.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy sends her unemployed son to live with his equally irresponsible father.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche renews hostilities with her sister when she travels home to attend her father's funeral.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The ladies grow tired of Christmas shopping during a heat wave; they volunteer to serve Christmas dinner at a soup kitchen.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: As a friendly gesture, Niles tries to help Maris get rid of $8,000 in parking tickets.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frasier encourages everyone to take a "bonus day" and do something special to celebrate the leap year.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba's best friend returns to Houston and uncovers a photograph that hints at infidelity early in Reba and Brock's marriage.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba celebrates her divorce with lunch and finds her credit card is declined; Reba is angered to find out Brock let Barbra Jean run up the shared credit card for her wedding.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock asks Reba to help plan his father's funeral after he dies on a golf course and Barbra Jean wants the funeral a grand event and play the bereaved woman.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Since the divorce is final, a friend hooks up Reba with her old college boyfriend.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba tries to persuade Brock's doubting bride to continue with the wedding while dealing with Kyra not wanting to attend the ceremony.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba tries to reconcile with Van and his parents, but her plan backfires when his mother walks out on her husband and stays with Reba.

programme.title: A Christmas to Remember
programme.desc: A TV personality drives to a small-town mountain retreat. On her way, a blizzard veers her off the road and she crashes. When she awakens, she has complete amnesia, and a friendly passerby takes her in.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Merry
programme.desc: Looking for a fresh angle for her book on relationships, Merry heads to snow-covered Vermont. She soon finds a new perspective and Christmas cheer when she meets a charismatic aid worker named Chris.

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: Christmas Made to Order
programme.desc: When an architect finds himself hosting his family for Christmas, he turns to a holiday coordinator for help. Her expert Christmas spirit brings his family together, but neither expected it to bring them closer to each other.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Christmas Island
programme.desc: When a snowstorm diverts Kate's first private flight to Christmas Island, she must team up with an air traffic controller to secure her dream job as the family's pilot.
